恐龙类(Dinosauria)可分为龙盘目(Saurischians)和鸟盘目(Ornithischians)两个目(order)。从身体结构上看，龙盘目和鸟盘目最大的分别 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: from modern Latin Ornithiscia, from Greek ornis, ornith- 'bird' + iskhion 'hip joint'

means.word_mean: 1. herbivorous dinosaur with a pelvis like that of a bird
